metadata.title: CVE-2019-10026 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Xpdf 4.01.01. There is an FPE in the function PostScriptFunction::exec in Function.cc for the psOpRoll case.

notes.note: jdstrand> xpdf in koffice is 2.0 mdeslaur> couldn't reproduce in poppler ebarretto> since 0.5.12-1 libextractor does not use xpdf anymore.

criterions.comment: poppler package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.76.1-0ubuntu3').
xpdf package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
